text: Yakshcho vin divorces yi (protyahom tretʹoho chasu), tse ye nezakonna dlya nʹoho remarry yi, yakshcho ne vona odruzhuyetʹsya z inshoyu lyudynoyu, todi vin divorces yi. Pershyy cholovik mozhe todi remarry yi, stilʹky, skilʹky vony zauvazhuyutʹ BOZHI zakony. Tse - BOZHI zakony; Vin roz'yasnyuye yim dlya lyudey shcho znayutʹ
